game.name: Unity-Chan: Desktop Companion
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Subtitle Options, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An AI desktop companion with her own personality and a virtual room to play various mini games with her. "Hi! My name is Kohaku Otori, but everyone calls me Unity-chan! I just found a way to visit you on your desktop, may I come? ðŸ§¡"
